P003595.project_name: SECOND RED SOILS AREA DEV. PROJECT

project_abstract.cdata: The Second Red Soils Area Development Project will increase production and productivity over a wide area of degraded red soils in the provinces of Jiangxi, Fujian, Hunan, Zhejiang and the Guangxi Autonomous Region. It will help alleviate poverty by increasing the income of currently underemployed farmers. The project will also benefit the environment by improving soil and water conservation, reducing erosion and promoting sustainable land use and agricultural practices. It will support the integrated development of paddy, upland and forest areas, totalling some 52,500 ha in 217 small watersheds. The main features of the project are: (a) land development including vegetative and structural soil/water conservation treatments and on-farm irrigation canals and pumping stations, rural electrification, roads and biogas units; (b) crop establishment and forestry including fruit and nut orchards, mulberry, tea and paddy rehabilitation and fodder crops; (c) livestock and aquaculture including dairy cattle, pigs and fish ponds; (d) agroprocessing and marketing including feed mills, fruit and vegetable processing and packing lines, cold storage and tea processing; and (e) support for research, extension and training.

P003595.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>红壤地区开发项目二期</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目将增加江西、福建、湖南、浙江和广西等省区辽阔的退化红壤地区的产量，提高红壤生产能力。项目将通过增加目前就业不充分农户的收入帮助开展扶贫，也将通过加强水土保持、减少水土流失及促进可持续土地利用和农业实践等措施改善环境。项目将支持对217个小流域内共计5.25万公顷水田、高地和林地进行综合开发。本项目的主要内容是：（1）土地开发，包括植物性和工程性水土保持措施、田间灌渠和泵站、农村电气化工程、道路和沼气池建设；（2）作物种植和林业，包括果树和坚果树、桑椹、茶树、改良水稻和饲料作物；（3）畜牧和水产养殖，包括奶牛、生猪和鱼塘；（4）农产品加工和销售，包括饲料厂、水果蔬菜加工和包装作业线、冷藏和茶叶加工；（5）研究、农技推广及培训支持。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
